metadata.title: CVE-2019-17670 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: WordPress before 5.2.4 has a Server Side Request Forgery (SSRF)vulnerability because Windows paths are mishandled during certainvalidation of relative URLs.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
